info.name: SOMER blink Slimmed [Hacked Together]
info.description: This is an attempt to reduce some of the clutter of SOMERblink when browsing on mobile devices.
info.additionalInfo:
Initial release, highly untested. This is primarily aimed towards the active blinks page.
v02 (Apr 27, 2013) - Made the lists retain the number of the ticket they're bidding on.

Sorry about screenshot quality. 100kb is not much to work with.
